tool_description: Bitcoin market metrics. Moving Average of BTC price for 100 and 200 days.  Volatility of 30 days  BTC's price .
name: Bitcoin Termometer
title: Bitcoin Termometer

api_list.name: PlanB Stock-to-Flow modeling prediction
api_list.description:
Return the followings variables:

Current date: date the data was processed.
Current price: market price in dollars
Predicted price: price predicted by the model.
Predicted × 1SE:	multiplied by 1 standard error
Predicted ÷ 1SE:	divided by 1 standard error
Predicted × 2SE:	multiplied by 2 standard errors
Predicted ÷ 2SE: divided by 2 standard errors

PlanB: https://twitter.com/100trillionusd
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-termometer.p.rapidapi.com/s2f"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-termometer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-termometer.p.rapidapi.com/s2f"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-termometer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: BTC 30 Days Volatility
api_list.description: This endpoint returns last 30 days volatility of Bitcoin's price.

api_list.name: BTC Moving Average
api_list.description: Moving Average for Bitcoin Price for the last 100 or 200 days

required_parameters.name: btc_average_days
required_parameters.description: Valid parameters are "100" or "200". These parameters correspond to the number of the days for Moving Average of Bitcoin Price to be calculated.
